main event: Several UFO sightings were reported in El Paso, Texas, during June 1964, with observations of a spherical balloon and other unidentified objects.
interesting points: The U.S. Army concluded that many UFO reports were identified as balloons,One report described a silvery disc-shaped object observed by reputable witnesses,An investigation showed no conclusive evidence of a UFO in photographs taken by a young boy,The boy's photographs were deemed to show nothing significant upon analysis,Multiple independent observers reported seeing sightings over El Paso in June 1964.
sighted object: spherical balloon and unidentified flying objects
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Charles Smith, and a 14-year-old boy named Jack Spice
